strings: <se_low>Chen Mui: This leads to the Heavenly Dais where you will find the Lord of the Dragovians.
<se_low>Chen Mui: But going into battle when you are so tired would be most unwise. Come, rest at my house.

<voice_0x010017B0><se_def>*: Master Chen Mui! You've finally returned!
I have looked forward to this day!
<voice_0x010017B1><se_low>Chen Mui: Ah, yes. Thank you for watching over things in my absence.

<voice_0x010017B2><se_low>Chen Mui: I brought some human guests with me today.
I want you to make sure they are comfortable.

<voice_0x010017B3><se_def>*: Guests from the human world!?
Do you mean one of them is Miss Xia's<endash>
<voice_0x010017B4><se_low>Chen Mui: Why don't you begin preparing tonight's meal?

<voice_0x010017B5><se_def>*: Uh... Of course, Master!
A cheese banquet, I presume?
I'll begin preparations right away.
<voice_0x010017B6><se_low>Chen Mui: Please, make yourselves at home!
<voice_0x010017B7><se_low>Yangus: Wot a spread, eh? I don't think I've ever eaten that much cheese in me 'ole life!

<voice_0x010017B8><se_low>Yangus: Not that I'm complainin', mind.
That was good grub!
I'm just feelin' a bit cosy round the old midriff.
<voice_0x010017B9><se_high>Jessica: That's Yangus, always thinking with his stomach! By the way, there's something about this Chen Mui fellow that sticks in my mind.

<voice_0x010017BA><se_high>Jessica: We only just met him today.
How does he know so much about us?
<voice_0x010017BB><se_def>Angelo: Actually, I found the attitude of the Elders even more bizarre.
<voice_0x010017BC><se_def>Angelo: It was as if they'd known about <hero> for a long time.
<voice_0x010017BD><se_low>Yangus: You reckon? I didn't notice nuffin' weird.
<voice_0x010017BE><se_low>Yangus: But if it's buggin' ya, like, why don't you ask that old Chen-wotsit bloke, eh?
<voice_0x010017BF><se_high>Jessica: You know, for once I actually agree with you, Yangus!
<voice_0x010017C0><se_def>Angelo: I seriously doubt he'll spit out the truth there and then, but it can't hurt to try.

<se_low>Yangus: Here, guv!
It's a bit late to be goin' places, ain't it?
